commands.name: az partnercenter marketplace offer setup show
commands.syntax: az partnercenter marketplace offer setup show --id
examples: az partnercenter marketplace offer setup show --offer-id MyOfferId

commands.name: az partnercenter marketplace offer setup update
commands.syntax:
az partnercenter marketplace offer setup update --id
                                                [--add]
                                                [--force-string]
                                                [--remove]
                                                [--reseller {false, true}]
                                                [--sell-through-microsoft {false, true}]
                                                [--set]
                                                [--test-drive {false, true}]
                                                [--trial-uri]
examples: az partnercenter marketplace offer setup update --offer-id MyOfferId --sell-through-microsoft true
